hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Basement Pot 6: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: Have you thought about going where the items are?^Just saying.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nut Capacity#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #6# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Green Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nut Capacity#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Red Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Green Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Water Temple#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path of #hearts#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #Nayru's Love#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Left Side Pot 2

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say Ganondorf's bolts can be reflected with glass or steel.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #the Minuet of Forest#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Chest On Fire

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #3# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the easiest way to kill Peahats is using Din's Fire while they're grounded.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Shadow Temple Boss Key#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Map Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Near Boss Pot 2

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Small Key#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #deep in the wasteland# is #a Spirit Temple Compass#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #Impa's cow cage#.
